txt.en: 'The Ghâshfra now approach our position. Steady your bows!'
<rgb=#00FF00>The watch-tower is now secured, but the enemy regroups in their encampment below</rgb>
Clear the enemy encampment below the watch-tower
Clear the enemy encampment below the watch-tower.
<rgb=#00FF00>Dagtark has been defeated, and the enemy encampment has been cleared!</rgb>
Raise the banner to proclaim that the watch-tower has been secured!
You have been tasked with protecting the Elves left to guard the entrance to The Rift.
The enemy encampment can now be secured!

'I thank you for coming to our aid. Since the Rangers departed, we have been able to hold the entrance to The Rift. Recently it has been difficult with the Iron Crown renewing their efforts to expand out from Angmar. You have assisted us and that assistance will not be forgotten. May your travels be swift and safe, my friend.'
The ruthless Ghâshfra leader has appeared to defend the enemy encampment!
'I am glad you have arrived. We are the last line of defence and our numbers are few!'
